events.description: 321. Throughout the war, research in Britain, America and Germany had pursued the possibility of harnessing to war the poten- tialities of atomic energy, and the first atomic bombs were dropped with devastating effect on metropolitan Japan at Hiroshima and Nagasaki on 5th and 9th August, 1945, respectively. Adding further to the plight of Japan was the declaration of war by Russia on 8th August, followed by Soviet Forces crossing the Man- churian and Korean borders.
